about_the_game:
Dive into a rich and immersive world filled with magic, mystery, and adventure in our captivating fantasy turn-based JRPG. The fate of a realm teetering on the brink of darkness lies in your hands. As the protagonist, you must choose your destiny among three distinct classes: the fearless Warrior, the cunning Rogue, or the enigmatic Mage, each offering a unique playstyle and abilities.

In 'Soulstone of Hope,' you'll not only shape the destiny of your main character but also forge unbreakable bonds with diverse and memorable companions. Your followers are more than just allies; they are your confidants, offering support, humor, and even romance as you journey deeper into the forgotten catacombs.

Uncover the secrets of a mystical artifact, the enigmatic Soul Stone, as you battle through treacherous dungeons and face formidable boss monsters. The fate of the realm hinges on your choices, your strategy in turn-based combat, and the relationships you nurture along the way.

Are you ready to become the hero this world needs? Your adventure awaits in 'Soulstone of Hope'.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Choose Your Hero: Play as a Warrior, Rogue, or Mage, each with a unique skill set and abilities.
  • Epic Battles: Engage in turn-based combat with challenging boss monsters and strategic encounters.
  • Multiple Endings: Experience different outcomes based on your decisions and actions.
  • Stunning Art: Enjoy visually stunning character designs, environments, and magical effects.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (such as Kernel or Compositor) Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
